page.title: 04GRAND HOTEL
page.content: On Friday 12th October,at approximately 3a.m.there was an explosion in the Grand Hotel.The bomb was planted between the walls of rooms 562 and 564 on the sixth floor.The target was Margeret Thatcher, the Prime Minister who was staying at the hotel with her cabinet because of the Conservative party conference next door in the Brighton Centre.the I.R.A. planted the bomb but they missed their target.She was in her bathroom only five minutes before the explosion. Mr.& Mrs. Norman Tebbit weren't so lucky.They were in bed when the bomb went off.Four floors collapsed and they fell to the third floor.Mr.Tebbit was rescued after being buried under rubble for three hours.Mrs.Tebbit was paralysed,and five people were killed.The hotel is now being rebuilt.
